data.name: WarningWrongUsernamePassword
data.value: You could not be logged in! Please check your username and password.

data.name: ErrorNoGroups
data.value: No groups could be loaded! Either you have no groups or something went wrong.

data.name: FeedbackDetailsDefault
data.value: Your feedback will be sent to Maxi! You can also, e.g., include links to images.

data.name: FeedbackDetailsError
data.value: Something went wrong unexpectedly! The error has been reported with the ID {0}.

data.name: FeedbackResponseError
data.value: If possible, please enter more details what you did before the error occured here:

data.name: FeedbackEmailDefault
data.value: If you want to possibly be contacted, enter your email address here:

data.name: FeedbackEmailError
data.value: If you want to be notified by email when the error is fixed, enter your email address here:

data.name: LoginExplanation
data.value: Login with your Rollenspielhimmel username and password to get started!

data.name: WarningNoThreadsFor
data.value: No threads could be loaded for group {0}!

data.name: WarningNothingSelected
data.value: You have to select at least one group and one thread!

data.name: WarningMissingFolder
data.value: Please choose an export folder first!

data.name: ExportFolderContainsFilesQuestion
data.value: This folder already contains files. Files will be overwritten, if they have the same name. Are you sure that you want to use this folder?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroup
data.value: Include the name of the group at the top?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroupAuthor
data.value: Also include the owner of the group?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroupPostedAt
data.value: Also include when the group was created?

data.name: OptionIncludeGroupUrl
data.value: Also include the URL to the group?

data.name: OptionIncludeThread
data.value: Include the name of the thread at the top?

data.name: OptionIncludeThreadAuthor
data.value: Also include the author of the thread?

data.name: OptionIncludeThreadPostedAt
data.value: Also include when the thread was created?

data.name: OptionIncludeThreadUrl
data.value: Also include the URL to the thread?

data.name: OptionIncludePostAuthor
data.value: Include the author of the posts?

data.name: OptionIncludePostPostedAt
data.value: Include when the post was posted?

data.name: OptionDownloadToOwnFolder
data.value: Download the threads for each group into a separate folder?

data.name: OptionDownloadImagesToOwnFolder
data.value: Download the images for each post into a separate folder?

data.name: OptionIncludeImages
data.value: Export the posts with its images?

data.name: OptionDownloadImages
data.value: Download the images of the posts?

data.name: OptionReserveOrder
data.value: Reverse the order of the posts (newest to oldest instead of oldest to newest)?

data.name: FileFormatTxt
data.value: Text File (.txt) - Contains text only, no images and no formatting

data.name: FileFormatHtml
data.value: HTML File (.html) - Contains formatted text and (if selected) images

data.name: FileFormatDocx
data.value: Word File (.docx) - Contains text and (if selected) images

data.name: WarningMissingFileFormat
data.value: Please choose at least one export file format!

data.name: LoginSubtitle
data.value: Quickly and easily export and backup your Rollenspielhimmel groups, threads and posts!

data.name: ExportCancelExportQuestion
data.value: Do you want to cancel the export?

data.name: WarningExportCancelled
data.value: The export was cancelled. Some files may have already been exported.

data.name: LoginAcceptLicense
data.value: I have read and accept the applicable notices and license terms

data.name: LoginOpenLicense
data.value: (Click here to open the applicable notices and license terms)

data.name: LoginMissingLicense
data.value: You have to accept the applicable notices and license terms before you can login

data.name: LoginOpenSentry
data.value: Click here to learn more out Sentry

data.name: LoginAcceptSentry
data.value: I allow anonymous data to be collected for application monitoring and error tracking using Sentry.

data.name: ErrorNoSentry
data.value: Sentry is used to send your feedback. Unfortunately, because you have not agreed to the use of Sentry, your feedback cannot be collected.

data.name: HelpLoginStep1
data.value: First enter the username and password you use on Rollenspielhimmel to log in.

data.name: HelpLoginStep2
data.value: Then click here to log in and continue with selecting your groups and threads.

data.name: HelpSelectStep1
data.value: Start by selecting the groups. Clicking on a group will load all threads of it.

data.name: HelpSelectStep2
data.value: Then, for each group, select the posts you want to export.

data.name: HelpSelectStep3
data.value: Here you can select und unselect all groups and/or threads.

data.name: HelpSelectStep4
data.value: You can open a group or thread in the browser by clicking on the small icon to the right of the group or thread name.

data.name: HelpSelectStep5
data.value: If you have selected all groups and threads, continue to export by clicking here. (You can also go back again without losing any of your changes.)

data.name: HelpExportStep1
data.value: First check whether you have selected all groups and threads you want to export.

data.name: HelpExportStep2
data.value: You can always go back to selecting groups and threads. All of your changes are automatically saved.

data.name: HelpExportStep3
data.value: Start the export process by choosing the folder the files should be saved in. Files will be overwritten, if they already exist.

data.name: HelpExportStep4
data.value: Then choose the format (or multiple formats) of the exported files.

data.name: HelpExportStep5
data.value: Configure how you want the groups and threads to be exported.

data.name: HelpExportStep8
data.value: Finally, you can start the export here. (Exporting can take a while, especially with a slow internet connection.) You can also cancel the export at any time.

data.name: WelcomeTitle
data.value: Thanks for using the RSH Exporter

data.name: WelcomeText
data.value:
Just a heads-up before you jump in: The program is still in early development. You might experience some bugs and some features are still being developed. Make sure that you are using the most recent version!
If you need help, most pages have a "Help" button at the top which explains the current page in detail. There is also a "Feedback" button for your ideas, suggestions and general feedback which I am always happy to receive.
To simplify finding and fixing possible bugs, this program uses Sentry, a application monitoring and error tracking software. Therefore, please consider allowing Sentry to track errors!

data.name: HelpWelcomeStep1
data.value: Hi! These help dialogs will hopefully help you with learning how to use this program. Most pages have a help dialog which explains how the current page works.

data.name: HelpWelcomeStep2
data.value: Allowing Sentry to collect anonymous data when an error occurs helps me immensely with fixing these errors.

data.name: HelpWelcomeStep3
data.value: You can click here to go to the repository of the program.

data.name: HelpWelcomeStep4
data.value: Here you can see the current version number of the program.

data.name: HelpWelcomeStep5
data.value: And here the team which helps me with designing and programming.

data.name: HelpWelcomeStep6
data.value: And if you are ready, click here to continue to the login.

data.name: ErrorTemplates
data.value: There is a problem with your {0} templates!

data.name: TemplatesDetails1
data.value: The text file export uses the text templates. The HTML file and Word file export use the HTML templates. The head templates stand for the header of the export of a thread and the body templates for the answers of the thread. At the placeholder

data.name: ErrorExportFailed
data.value: There was a problem while exporting! The thread(s) {0} could not be successfully exported!

data.name: HelpExportStep6
data.value: Instead of using the checkboxes of the previous step, advanced users can also edit the export templates directly. This required basic knowledge of HTML.

data.name: HelpExportStep7
data.value: You can also configure where the files will be saved, whether all files should be in one folder or whether every group and/or all images of a thread should have their separate folder.

data.name: TemplatesDetails2
data.value:
of the head templates the body templates for the answers are inserted when exporting.
The default templates are based on the current export text options. Only if a text option is selected, the placeholder is also displayed in the default template.

data.name: WelcomeAllowSentryQuestion
data.value: It would be great if you could allow Sentry to track bugs! Is Sentry allowed to collect anonymous data when a bug occurs?

data.name: ErrorSomeThreadsFailedToLoad
data.value: Some thread(s) of group {0} could not be loaded!

data.name: ErrorSomeGroupsFailedToLoad
data.value: Some groups could not be loaded!

data.name: ErrorReportedToSentry
data.value: The error has been reported with Sentry and hopefully will be fixed soon!

data.name: ErrorNotReportedToSentry
data.value: Unfortunately, because you have not agreed to the use of Sentry, the error cannot be collected.
